name: Blinds
overview: Charles Grey (Iceout) has a new game for the Commodore C64. The game is very small, it is only 256 Bytes. That is only 1 block to disk. In the game you have to top them up with the bottom. You can adjust the patterns using the joystick (left / right) or the reverse pattern (up / down). If the two patterns are correct you can add them together with the fire button.
